Articles.Content: I just got the full version of ksp for PS4 and it is extremely difficult to build in the VAB because I cannot scroll up. In the demo version I noticed that I can scroll up and zoom out, but I can only zoom out on the controller. I also would like to know how to switch vehicles. Thanks for replying!

Hey, welcome to KSP!  

 

Hopefully this will help you:  

http://imgur.com/a/Cxnk5

Edited December 30, 2016 by klesh

Assuming the pages are laid out in a similar manner to the computer version you'll want to look in the "settings" on the main title page, "Input", move over to the "game" tab, look in "editor" for the scroll page up/scroll page down controls.
Thanks that really made rocket building easier and possible.
